description: Multi-Photo Challenge Sample Clues - Showcasing the new requiredPhotos feature

clues.title: üèõÔ∏è British Museum Artifact Hunt
content: Welcome to the British Museum Collection Challenge!
Find and photograph these 5 famous artifacts:
Each photo must clearly show the artifact's information plaque.

optionA.title: Instagram Story
optionA.description: Create an Instagram story with 6 slides showing your race journey: 1) Team photo at start, 2) First location, 3) Challenge in progress, 4) Food/drink break, 5) Funny moment, 6) Victory celebration.

optionB.title: TikTok Collection
optionB.description: Film 4 different TikTok-style videos: 1) Team introduction dance (15s), 2) Challenge tutorial, 3) Behind-the-scenes blooper, 4) Finish line celebration.

clues.title: üé® Street Art Documentation
clues.question: Who has the best eye for art and photography?
clues.task: Find 7 different pieces of street art or murals in the arts district. Take artistic photos of each piece with creative angles. One team member must appear in each photo interacting with or posed by the artwork.

clues.title: üöá Transportation Photo Journey
content: Travel from Central Station to the Observatory using only public transportation.
Document your journey with these specific photos:
7. Panoramic city view from the Observatory

optionA.title: International Flavors
optionA.description: Visit 4 different ethnic food venues and order a signature dish from each. Take photos of: 1) Each restaurant's storefront, 2) The dish you ordered, 3) Team member trying the food, 4) Receipt showing order details.

optionB.title: Sweet Tooth Safari
optionB.description: Find 8 different dessert shops and take photos of their most popular dessert. Each photo must include the dessert name/price visible in the display case.

clues.title: üìö Library Research Challenge
clues.question: Who loves diving into books and research?
clues.task: Find books published in 6 different decades (1960s through 2010s). Take photos of each book's title page clearly showing the publication year. Books must be from 6 different subject categories.

clues.title: üè¢ Architecture Appreciation
content: 10. Team selfie with city skyline background

optionA.title: Urban Wildlife Spotting
optionA.description: Find and photograph 5 different types of urban wildlife (birds, squirrels, insects, etc.). Each photo must show the animal clearly with urban elements visible in the background.

optionB.title: City Garden Tour
optionB.description: Visit 3 different parks or gardens and take 2 photos at each: one of the garden's entrance sign and one artistic shot of flowers/plants with a team member.

clues.title: üé≠ Performance Art Challenge
clues.question: Who's ready to be the star of the show?
clues.task: Choose a busy public location and perform a 3-minute street performance (music, comedy, magic, etc.). Document with: 1) Performance setup photo, 2) Mid-performance action shot, 3) Audience reaction shot, 4) Final bow with gathered crowd.

clues.title: üèÅ Grand Finale Photo Finish
content: 3. Group selfie with finish line banner
5. Team holding up 'We Did It!' signs
Show your race spirit and celebrate your amazing journey!
